snippet.title: (Virus_); | Rougelike Trailer #1
snippet.description:
(Virus_); is a roguelike platformer, where you (a virus) travel to different devices, trying to destroy them. With each failed run, you unlock new items and upgrade your virus! Coming to early access on steam in 2023/2024!
WISHLIST NOW! : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1965790/Virus/

https://www.pixelriftstudios.com

#gamedev #indiegame #indiegamedevs #indiegamedev #indiegamedevelopment #gamestudio #platformer
